class Solution(object):
    def minimumCost(self, nums):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        def is_palindrome(n):
            return str(n) == str(n)[::-1]

        def find_next_palindrome(n):
            s = str(n)
            half = len(s) // 2
            odd = len(s) % 2
            left = s[:half + odd]
            next_palindrome = int(left + left[:half][::-1])
            if next_palindrome < n:
                if odd:
                    left_mid = int(left[:-1] + str(int(left[-1]) + 1))
                else:
                    left_mid = str(int(left) + 1)
                next_palindrome = int(left_mid + left_mid[:half][::-1])
            return next_palindrome

        nums.sort()
        median = nums[len(nums) // 2]
        palindrome_target = find_next_palindrome(median)
        cost = sum(abs(num - palindrome_target) for num in nums)
        return cost
